ukgeog 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Get UK Shape Files

get_sf.Rd

get_sf fetches shape files from ONS Open Geography Portal.

get_sf(
  geog,
  year = 2019,
  nations = c("E", "S", "W", "N"),
  type = "BGC",
  crs = 4326
)

Arguments

geog

Which geographical
year

Which year
nations

Which UK nations
type

Which boundary type
crs

Any Coordinate Reference System ESPG, recommend 4326 (World Geodetic System) or potentially 27700 (UK OS British National Grid)

Value

Output is...

Details

This function...

Examples

get_sf("NAT")
#> Simple feature collection with 4 features and 11 fields
#> geometry type:  MULTIPOLYGON
#> dimension:      XY
#> bbox:           xmin: -8.649996 ymin: 49.86474 xmax: 1.763706 ymax: 60.86078
#> geographic CRS: WGS 84
#>   objectid        cd               nm        ctry19nmw  bng_e  bng_n     long
#> 1        1 E92000001          England           Lloegr 394883 370883 -2.07811
#> 2        2 N92000002 Northern Ireland Gogledd Iwerddon  86544 535337 -6.85570
#> 3        3 S92000003         Scotland         Yr Alban 277744 700060 -3.97094
#> 4        4 W92000004            Wales            Cymru 263405 242881 -3.99417
#>        lat st_area.shape. st_length.shape.                       geometry
#> 1 53.23497   130459836166         11957229 MULTIPOLYGON (((-2.029386 5...
#> 2 54.61501    14330042878          1048413 MULTIPOLYGON (((-6.481663 5...
#> 3 56.17743    78799932231         16985357 MULTIPOLYGON (((-3.373931 5...
#> 4 52.06741    20781773816          3022064 MULTIPOLYGON (((-3.313122 5...
#>   country
#> 1       E
#> 2       N
#> 3       S
#> 4       W
get_sf("UTLA", nations = c("E","W"))
